   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var titleBlocks = document.querySelectorAll('title');
 
     if (titleBlocks && titleBlocks.length > 1) {
         titleBlocks[0].parentElement.removeChild(titleBlocks[0]);
     }
   </script>
   <!--End of Zopim Live Chat Script-->
  </body>
 </html>
